name: Excel Sales Person Ranking By Sales
query:
SELECT
    si.territory AS "Territory:Data:240",
    si.customer_group AS "Customer Group:Data:120",
    SUM(si.outstanding_amount) AS "Total Account Receivable:Currency:120",
    SUM(si.rounded_total) AS "Net Sales:Currency:120",
    SUM(pe.paid_amount) AS "Collection:Currency:120",
    ((SUM(pe.paid_amount) / sum(si.rounded_total) * 100)) AS "Sales-Collection Ratio",
    ((SUM(pe.paid_amount) / SUM(si.outstanding_amount)) * 100) AS "Account Receivable - Collection Ratio"
    
FROM
	`tabSales Invoice` AS si,`tabPayment Entry` AS pe
WHERE 
    si.docstatus = 1 and si.posting_date >= "2020-12-01" and si.posting_date <= "2020-12-30" and pe.posting_date >= "2020-12-01" and pe.posting_date <= "2020-12-30"
GROUP BY 
    si.territory,si.customer_group
LIMIT 2
report_name: Excel Sales Person Ranking By Sales
